name: El Credito - El PerritoÂ
additionalNotes: El Credito fills the void when you need cheap and tasty Cigar Boom-era bundles. Handcrafted from a complex combination of Dominican and Nicaraguan long-filler tobaccos, El Credito is available in your choice of a Natural wrapper or a Maduro variety, both grown in Ecuador. El Credito is named for the Miami-based factory where Ernesto Perez Carrillo launched his iconic La Gloria Cubana label many years ago. Indulge in a medium-bodied bouquet of coffee beans, leather, and spices.
